newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: KFA to seek 44,500T soymeal, 4,500T rapemeal.
newsitem.headline: KFA to seek 44,500T soymeal, 4,500T rapemeal.

text.p: South Korea's Korea Feed Association (KFA) will invite tenders for 44,500 tonnes of soybean meal and 4,500 tonnes of rapeseed meal by 2.00 p.m. (0500 GMT) on Tuesday, a KFA official said on Monday.
Last Friday traders said the KFA would tender for 40,000 tonnes of soybean meal and 5,000 tonnes of rapeseed meal.

The KFA wants to buy the total amount in three positions: one for 23,000 tonnes of soybean meal, another for 13,000 tonnes of soybean meal, and the other for 8,500 tonnes of soybean meal plus 4,500 tonnes of rapeseed meal, the KFA official said.
